timeline.bodyText: Potential NPE using the equals method here. You can either use the == comparator  or switch the enum instance calling the equals() metod, eg  HMILevel.HMI_FULL.equals(prevHMILevel) as the HMILevel enum instances will always be valid. Either solution will work.
